name: Are You Still There by Joy Harjo
name_original: Are You Still There by Joy Harjo
description:
Back here with another bitsy poem. This time bringing you Joy Harjo.
What can you say on the phone when you can't find your voice?
Takes only a few minutes to play.

This game has not been endorsed by Joy Harjo. If anyone knows with her feel free to share it and if she wants it taken down I will oblige.
